title: weight
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015022839/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015022839/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Weight**

The visual darkness or lightness of the strokes in a character: [ultralight](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015022839/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ultralight), [light](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015022839/http:/typophile.com/wiki/light), [book](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015022839/http:/typophile.com/wiki/book), [medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015022839/http:/typophile.com/wiki/medium), [regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015022839/http:/typophile.com/wiki/regular), [semibold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015022839/http:/typophile.com/wiki/semibold), [bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015022839/http:/typophile.com/wiki/bold), [black](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015022839/http:/typophile.com/wiki/black), [ultrablack](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015022839/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ultrablack), [extrablack](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015022839/http:/typophile.com/wiki/extrablack), etc.
